Title: Shabondama
Writer: Asa Nonami (based on the novel by), Shinji Azuma (screenplay)
Actors: Kazuyuki Aijima, Mina Fujii, Kento Hayashi, Etsuko Ichihara
Plot: Izumi is an urchin who was set adrift by his parents. He is a thug, a thief and a predator. on the run from the cops he takes to the mountains of Miyazaki in southern Japan where he happens...
